keylist¶

isopy.keylist(*keys, skip_duplicates=False, allow_duplicates=True, allow_reformatting=True)[source]¶

Convert keys into a key string list and return it. keys can be a string or a sequence of string.

Will attempt to convert keys into a MassKeyList, ElementKeyList, IsotopeKeyList, RatioKeyList and finally a GeneralKeyList. The first successfully conversion is returned.
